Title: Prohibits the confinement of farm animals in a cruel manner
Summary: Prohibits the confinement of farm animals in a cruel manner; provides that anyone who violates such cruel confinement prohibitions shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.
LawCode: Add ยง353-g, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and market law, in relation to prohibiting the confinement of farm animals in a cruel manner
